Hush Line creates a new PGP key pair when you install the app.
Periodically create new keys. This ensures that even if an old key is compromised, new messages will remain safe.

Hush Line is a free and open-source app to host a private tip line enabling anyone to send you encrypted messages without requiring technical expertise, downloading software, generating keys, or creating an account.\n\nLearn more at https://hushline.app.
We need permission to show you push notifications
We need you to grant permission to notify you when you get a new message. If you don\'t want that, that\'s fine as well.
Failed to create QR code. Try again.
Tap to access the address for receiving messages and tips.
